title: Virginia Canine Association Iron Dog Competition Results
body:
On May 18, 2011 members of the Special Operations Division, Canine Section competed in the Virginia Canine Association Iron Dog Competition.  The competition consisted of several events which included:  Suspect Apprehension, Muzzle Work, Article Search, Drug Detection, Agility and Gun Battle with Cover and Concealment. There were 45 competitors and 10 three man teams. The results were as follows:Pfc. Mike Amorino #2798 paired with two Howard County handlers – 1 Place teamPfc. Scott Allen#3081, Cpl. Geoffrey Brown #2456 and Cpl. Richard Smith #2669 – 3 Place team Cpl. Richard Smith #2669 – 3 Place Muzzle WorkCpl. Richard Smith #2669- 1 Place Criminal Apprehension and Article searchCpl. Geoffrey Brown #2456- 3 Place Gun Battle with Cover and ConcealmentPlease join the Special Operations Division in congratulating the Canine Officers and their accomplishments.
